directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and reserve.
In a small saucepan over medium heat, warm oil, butter, reserved clam juice, garlic and parsley; stir and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add clams and salt and pepper to taste. Pour over pasta and toss with Parmesan cheese; serve.
ingredients: 2 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, drained with juice reserved
title: Linguine and Clam Sauce
